title: George Bailey

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit another player.
- Once per game, you can purge (post 89) yourself. Although your identity as the good banker will become public.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If they're good, you will grant them an extra charge of a limited use ability, or, if they don't have a limited use ability, then they get one from another Town role at random.
- If they're evil, nothing happens.
- You can only visit each player once.
